question: Have Ikwaan al Muslimeen gone wrong?
answer:
QUESTION
I've read a few articles that hint at Ikwaan al Muslimeen being misguided plz expound
ANSWER


Share:
We do not have intimate knowledge of the Hizb al-Ikhwaan al-Muslimoon. We rely on and their articles on their homepage.

However, we observe that the learned Shaykh Abdul-Fattaah Abu-Ghuddah (RA) was among the graduates and the supporters of the group. We have our trust and confidence in such a personality. Kindly refer us to the articles that hint the group is being misguided.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
